short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides ability to capture and fill user credentials on applications launched from RapidIdentity tenants.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RapidIdentity Password Vault web extension is designed to provide an SSO experience for applications that utilize user provided credentials. When a Password Vault application is launched from a user's dashboard, this extension is able to automatically fill in previously captured credentials to log users quickly and securely in to their online resources.

PLEASE NOTE: Your school or organization must have RapidIdentity for this extension to work.
